item.title: nodejs递归读取所有文件
item.description: nodejs递归读取所有文件 var fs = require('fs'); var path = require('path'); function readFileList(dir, filesList = []) { const files = fs.readdirSync(dir); console.log(files); files.forEach((item, index) => { var fullPath = path.join(dir, item); const stat = fs.statSync(fullPath); if (stat.isDirectory()) { readFileList(path.join(dir, item), filesList); //递归读取文件 } else { filesList.push(fullPath); } }); return filesList; } var
